description: Searches across all agreements that a proposer has in AWS Marketplace.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Agreement listings reveal which AWS accounts have active contracts for third-party AI models, guiding attackers toward high-value tenants.
Knowing which principals accepted agreements indicates which compromised identities already have the required entitlements.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use SearchAgreements to enumerate Bedrock contracts, determine billing limits, and time their abuse before defenders notice unusual marketplace usage.
